          <title>
            <string language="en">One cell connected to a bulb</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Zelle schloß an eine Birne an</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une cellule reliée à une ampoule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma pilha conectou a um bulbo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una cellula ha collegato ad una lampadina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα κύτταρο που συνδέεται με έναν βολβό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una célula conectada con un bulbo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that one cell connected to a bulb results to a dimly lit bulb.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">voltage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">switch</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß eine Zelle an eine 
Birne Resultate an eine schwach Glühlampe anschloß.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve qu'une cellule s'est 
reliée aux résultats d'une ampoule à une ampoule faiblement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que uma pilha conectou 
aos resultados de um bulbo ao iluminou não ofuscante o bulbo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che una cellula ha 
collegato ai risultati della lampadina ad una lampadina fioco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ένα κύτταρο που 
συνδέεται με έναν βολβό οδηγεί σε έναν dimly αναμμένο βολβό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que una célula conectó
con los resultados de un bulbo con una bombilla dévil.</string>
          </description>
